ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( RecordType.Name != 'Partner', RecordType.Name != 'Alternate Channel', RecordType.Name != 'Community Connections - Property', RecordType.Name != 'Global', RecordType.Name != 'Organization', RecordType.Name != 'Billing', $Profile.Name <> 'Frontier System Administrator', $Profile.Name <> 'Frontier Auditor', $Profile.Name <> 'Data Analyst - DPI', $Profile.Name <> '#Commercial SMB Sales', $Profile.Name <> 'API - Integration', $Profile.Name <> '#MTU', $Profile.Name <> 'Lead Development Rep (LDR)',
OR( ISBLANK( ShippingCity ), ISBLANK( ShippingCountry ), ISBLANK( ShippingState ), ISBLANK( ShippingStreet ), ISBLANK( ShippingPostalCode) ) )
